title: What is the schedule for beach renourishment at Holden and Ocean Isle beaches?  All the news stories are old and just say that a contract has been signed.  None of the local government websites give specifics either.
text:
From our reporter:



OIB gets done this winter, probably after Wrightsville Beach and the
Pleasure Island towns. GHolden Beach trucked in sand last year, but no
plans for big dredging project.
